pattern: ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement
description: Dependency Installation Failure: A required Python package could not be installed via pip.
Environment Setup Failure: The Docker command is not available on the execution agent.
Network Connectivity Error: A network request failed, possibly due to a DNS or firewall issue.
NPM Package Not Found: A required NodeJS package could not be found in the registry.
Timeout Error: An operation did not complete within the expected time limit.
